entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
